locations: Beverly Hills, California, USA::(studio) (filmon tv studio)
imdb.plot outline: Each episode takes on a particular subject in the world of the paranormal or pseudo-science. In season one(our only season) we covered the Flat Earth Theory, a local haunted house, spell binding in the Mexican culture, Alien bases on the moon and alternative viewpoints of the UFO phenomenon. In the face of the fantastic and unbelievable, Jonesy navigates the discussion toward some new understanding and some semblance of what's "true enough". In addition to the interview Jonesy produces and stars in various paranormal related sketches.
imdb.title: The Edge with Jonesy
plot: The Edge is a paranormal talk show hosted by comedian Jonesy. Topics include pseudo science, aliens, witchcraft, ghosts and any "edge" phenomenon. Guest have been experts, authors and those that have experienced something inexplicable.::Jonesy

Each episode takes on a particular subject in the world of the paranormal or pseudo-science. In season one(our only season) we covered the Flat Earth Theory, a local haunted house, spell binding in the Mexican culture, Alien bases on the moon and alternative viewpoints of the UFO phenomenon. In the face of the fantastic and unbelievable, Jonesy navigates the discussion toward some new understanding and some semblance of what's "true enough". In addition to the interview Jonesy produces and stars in various paranormal related sketches.::Jonesy
